text: another reason why I left I met Gus
Hawkinson in August of 2004 and I was a

the first time I met Jen she came up and
she introduced herself hi I'm Jen Brown
wow this is a beautiful tall extremely

I came to New York really wanting to

important part of the story Oh
so we did go out on one date but then we

his entire house all the walls were just

what this is what is this thing it's
it's a skull that the one of the things

tells me now years later that she had

and didn't really think that this was

like she was like she is the planet and

about to lose this person who you know
throughout these months I just kept
learning and observing more and more
